title.value: Integrating equity, diversity and inclusion throughout the lifecycle of AI within healthcare: a scoping review protocol
title.justification: The title of the paper is clearly mentioned at the beginning of the document.
title.quote: Integrating equity, diversity and inclusion throughout the lifecycle of AI within healthcare: a scoping review protocol

extractions.description: The paper describes a protocol for a scoping review aimed at evaluating the integration of equity, diversity, and inclusion (EDI) concepts into AI interventions within healthcare. It outlines the methodology, eligibility criteria, and data extraction process for identifying relevant literature on this topic.

type.justification: The paper describes a protocol for a scoping review, which means it is concerned with developing a framework for literature review, not conducting empirical research.
type.quote: This article describes the protocol for a scoping review of the literature relating to integration of EDI in the AI interventions within healthcare setting.

name.justification: The paper is focused on the use of AI in healthcare settings and how EDI concepts are integrated within this context.
name.quote: integration of EDI in the AI interventions within healthcare setting

name.value: Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion (EDI) in AI
name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on evaluating how EDI principles are integrated into AI within healthcare settings.
name.quote: The objective of the review is to evaluate what has been done on integrating EDI concepts, principles and practices in the lifecycles of AI interventions within healthcare settings.
